name: Unknown Forest (DatFox)
description:
A tic-tac escapes laboratory which conducts experiments on food, and has to fight out his way to safety

Player can moves through levels that are filled with enemies. Every third room contains boss room and each of the rooms rewards the player after finishing them. Player can collect gold that enemies drop on death. The gold can't be used on anything at the moment, but in the future player should be able to buy new gear that makes him stronger.
